about.summary: Innovative and detail-oriented Full Stack Developer with a passion for creating seamless and engaging user experiences. Proficient in modern web technologies and dedicated to building efficient and scalable applications. Excited to leverage my skills to solve complex problems and contribute to a forward-thinking team.

About.title: About Me
About.description: A glimpse into my background, academic journey, and passion for software development.

story.title: My Story
paragraphs: From a young age, I've been captivated by how technology can shape our world. This curiosity led me to pursue a career in software development, where I can build digital solutions that are both functional and beautiful.

My expertise spans the full stack, from crafting intuitive user interfaces with React to architecting robust server-side logic with Node.js and Django. I thrive in collaborative environments and am always eager to learn new technologies and improve my craft.

education.degree: Master of Science in Software Engineering
education.description: Specialized in scalable systems, cloud computing, and advanced software architecture. Led a capstone project on a real-time data processing pipeline.

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Information Technology
education.description: Gained a comprehensive understanding of programming fundamentals, database systems, and networking principles. Graduated with honors.

Sklls.title: Skills & Technologies
Sklls.description: A look at the technical skills and tools I use to bring ideas to life.

Projects.title: Featured Projects
Projects.description: Here are some of the projects I'm proud to have worked on.

items.title: E-commerce Platform 'ShopSphere'
items.description: A full-featured e-commerce site with product listings, user authentication, and a Stripe-integrated checkout process, built with the MERN stack.

items.title: Task Management App 'TaskFlow'
items.description: A Kanban-style task management application with drag-and-drop functionality, real-time collaboration features using WebSockets, and a clean UI.

items.title: Recipe Finder API 'CuisineCraft'
items.description: A RESTful API built with Django and PostgreSQL that allows users to search for recipes, save favorites, and create meal plans.

items.title: Real-time Chat Application 'Connect'
items.description: A chat application built with React and Socket.IO, featuring private messaging, chat rooms, and online user status indicators.

Certificates.title: Certifications
Certificates.description: A collection of certifications that validate my skills and expertise.

items.title: AWS Certified Cloud Practitioner
items.description: Validated foundational, high-level understanding of AWS Cloud, services, and terminology.

items.title: Full-Stack Web Development
items.description: Completed an intensive bootcamp covering front-end and back-end technologies including React, Node.js, and PostgreSQL.

items.title: Certified Associate in Python Programming
items.description: Demonstrated proficiency in the Python language, including object-oriented programming and core libraries.

Experience.title: Work Experience
Experience.description: A summary of my professional roles and accomplishments.

responsibilities: Develop and maintain full-stack web applications using React, Node.js, and PostgreSQL.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define, design, and ship new features.
Write clean, scalable, and well-documented code following best practices.
Improve application performance by identifying and resolving bottlenecks.
Participate in code reviews to maintain high-quality code standards.
Assisted in developing and testing new features for a client's e-commerce website.
Translated UI/UX design wireframes into high-quality, responsive code.
Gained hands-on experience with version control using Git and GitHub.
Helped troubleshoot and debug issues to improve application stability.

Contact.title: Contact Me
Contact.description: I'm always open to discussing new projects, creative ideas, or opportunities to be part of an amazing team.

fields.label: Message
fields.name: message
fields.placeholder: Feel free to write your message here...

Achievements.title: Achievements
Achievements.description: Awards and accomplishments that highlight my academic excellence and technical expertise

items.title: Programming Contest Participation
items.description: Actively participated in programming debugging events and coding competitions during college functions. Demonstrated strong problem-solving skills and coding expertise.

items.title: Winner, InnovateX Hackathon 2024
items.description: Led a team to victory in a 48-hour hackathon, developing an AI-powered accessibility tool for web content. Praised for innovative use of technology and a compelling final presentation.

items.title: Academic Excellence Scholarship
items.description: Awarded a merit-based scholarship for maintaining a 4.0 GPA and demonstrating exceptional promise in the field of computer science.

items.title: Open Source Contributor
items.description: Contributed to the popular open-source project 'React-Table' by optimizing a key rendering function, resulting in a 15% performance improvement.

items.title: Best Capstone Project Award
items.description: Received the 'Best Capstone Project' award for a full-stack application that streamlined university event management, recognized for its robust architecture and user-centric design.
